Glossary
********


- DIAS

- DIAS node

- GDELT

    - data.gdeltproject.org

- GDELT Subscription

- Mock Device

- Protopeer Framework

    - A platform written in Java for carrying out small to medium scale peer-to-peer experiments

- DIAS Boostrap Server

- DIAS Gateway Server

- DIAS-Logging-System

    - EventLog

    - RawLog

    - MemLog

    - Persistence Client

    - Persistence Daemon

- DIAS Network Id

- Selected state

- Possible states

- Peer Sampling Service

- Active State

- Passive State

- UNIX screen
